recipesJson.name: Chocolate Rose Milk
recipesJson.author: DodgerFog33
recipesJson.description: This to me taste like a very Authentic chocolate milk. Itâ€™s nice and creamy and has some nice body and perfect amount of dairy notes coming from ice cream and sweet cream. SNV. Steep 3 days if you like. Can sub Chocolate for your favorite chocolate. I have 2 go to chocolates this one and Inw Chocolate Cream. You decide in the Chocolate that best meets your authentic chocolate flavoring. Mixed at 68vg 32 PG.
